articles.title: NASA, SpaceX launch instrument to check Earth's pollution levels from space. How it works - India Today
articles.description: NASA, along with SpaceX, has launched the first space-based pollution tracking instrument, which will track air quality levels across North America.
articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), in collaboration with Elon Musk's SpaceX, has launched a pollution monitoring instrument that will allow scienti… [+3575 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX Falcon 9 Launches Air Pollution Monitor | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The TEMPO sensor will measure air pollution in North America on an hourly basis.
articles.content:
At a Glance
